about.title: Crafted from silk, guided by story.
about.intro1: Linces’CKF was born from a simple idea: silk should feel as effortless as it looks. Our atelier creates premium silk garments for individuals and fashion brands who value comfort, longevity, and quiet luxury.
about.intro2: Every piece begins with fabric selection, continues through careful pattern making, and ends in precise finishing. We design for fluid movement, soft drape, and silhouettes that stay relevant beyond a single season.
about.customerText: For our customers, we create small, curated drops of blouses, dresses, shirts, and scarves. Each design is tested for fit and comfort, whether you are dressing for an event, a studio day, or a quiet evening.
about.craftText: From seams and linings to buttons and hems, every detail is considered. Our team balances traditional techniques with modern equipment to ensure consistent quality at every scale.
about.valuesQuietText: We focus on clean lines, refined silhouettes, and fabrics that feel as considered on the inside as they look on the outside.
about.valuesResponsibleText: Smaller drops, intentional batches, and a focus on durability help reduce overproduction and extend the life of each garment.
about.valuesCollabText: Beyond our own collections, we partner with brands to bring custom silk pieces to life through our B2B manufacturing services.

services.title: Silk manufacturing for modern fashion brands.
services.intro1: Linces’CKF partners with labels that need a reliable atelier for premium silk garments. From sampling to small-batch and recurring production, we support every stage with clear communication and consistent quality.
services.intro2: You bring the vision and brand language. We bring technical pattern making, fabric expertise, and a process designed for repeat collaborations.
services.processText: Our process is designed to be predictable and transparent, whether you are testing a single style or scaling a full capsule collection.
services.step1Text: Share references, tech packs, quantities, and timing so we can understand the scope and constraints.
services.step2Text: We translate your idea into a physical sample, refining fit and details before production.
services.step3Text: Once approved, we produce in small or recurring batches with strict quality checks.
services.step4Text: Your pieces are pressed, packed, and dispatched according to your shipping preferences and timelines.
services.partnershipText: Whether you are an emerging label or an established house, we aim to become an extension of your team. Clear production calendars, reliable lead times, and consistent communication are at the core of how we work with brands.
